data.description: Headquartered in Bihar India, Sumarth supports over 15000 farmers in their economic growth by providing a 360-degree  agricultural and technical solution. From crop planning to ensured market linkage in agriculture. Its core area is market linked profitable agriculture with an objective to make agriculture effortless, profitable and less risky. This includes investigating how blockchain solutions can aid this process on the ground as well as financially.
data.name: Sumarth
